page.title: 15 The Candle Factory.
page.content: The Candle Factory in Linlithgow was opened in 1983.Most of the workers are female and work part time.They make about 8 thousand candles a day and their biggest order has been 4 million candles for Avon the cosmetic firm.The wicks and wax come from all over the world but the wax mainly comes from America.The candles are then sent to other countries. It can take seconds to make small candles and days to make big ones. There are two methods of making candles.One is by dipping or by pouring molten wax into a mould and the other is by compressing powdered wax into shape.The dyed candles are hand carvered by the workers while still warm.
